title: Subway
short_description: Subway, the world's largest fast-food submarine sandwich chain, offers a fresh and customizable menu. Choose from an array of delicious subs, salads, and wraps, prepared with high-quality ingredients, providing a healthier and tasty dining experience.

deshes.name: Italian BMT
deshes.short_description: Savory and hearty: Italian BMT, a Subway classic filled with flavorful Italian meats, cheese, and veggies.

deshes.name: Chicken Teriyaki
deshes.short_description: Sweet and savory delight: Chicken Teriyaki, a Subway favorite featuring tender grilled chicken with teriyaki sauce.

deshes.name: Veggie Delight
deshes.short_description: Fresh and wholesome: Veggie Delight, a delicious Subway sub packed with a variety of crisp vegetables.

deshes.name: Cookie
deshes.short_description: Sweet, chocolaty and filling chocolate chip cookie

deshes.name: Meatball Marinara
deshes.short_description: Hearty and comforting: Meatball Marinara, a Subway classic featuring tender meatballs in rich marinara sauce.

title: Chipotle Mexican Grill
short_description: Chipotle Mexican Grill, a taste of fresh, customizable Mexican cuisine. Enjoy flavorful burritos, bowls, tacos, and salads, featuring responsibly sourced ingredients and a variety of mouthwatering salsas and toppings, all prepared with speed and passion.

deshes.name: Chicken Bowl
deshes.short_description: Hearty and flavorful: Chipotle's Chicken Bowl, a delicious blend of grilled chicken, rice, beans, and toppings.

deshes.name: All Veg Burrito
deshes.short_description: Veggie-packed goodness: Chipotle's Veg Burrito, a delectable blend of fresh vegetables, rice, beans, and salsa.

deshes.name: Chips
deshes.short_description: Crunchy and addictive: Chipotle's chips, a perfect side for savoring with salsa or guacamole

deshes.name: Quesadillas
deshes.short_description: Cheesy and savory: Chipotle's Quesadillas, a scrumptious blend of melted cheese and delicious fillings.

deshes.name: Tacos
deshes.short_description: Mexican flavors wrapped: Chipotle's Tacos, a delightful fusion of tender meat, toppings, and tortillas.

title: Dunkin' Donuts
short_description: Dunkin' Donuts, a beloved global brand, brings joy with its extensive menu. Savor a diverse range of freshly brewed coffees, delectable donuts, bagels, and satisfying breakfast sandwiches, making every visit a delightful experience.

deshes.name: Americano
deshes.short_description: Bold and smooth: Dunkin' Donuts' Americano, a rich espresso diluted with hot water, delivering pure coffee goodness.

deshes.name: Glazed Donuts
deshes.short_description: Sweet and delightful: Dunkin' Donuts' Glazed Donuts, a classic treat with a mouthwatering sugary glaze.

deshes.name: Muffins
deshes.short_description: Moist and flavorful: Dunkin' Donuts' Muffins, a delightful assortment of sweet and savory options.

deshes.name: Multigrain Bagel
deshes.short_description: Decadent morning delight: Dunkin' Donuts' Mutigrain Bagel, a rich and healthy twist to breakfast.

deshes.name: Expresso
deshes.short_description: Intense and bold: Dunkin' Donuts' Espresso, a concentrated shot of robust coffee for a pick-me-up.

title: Panera Bread
short_description: Panera Bread, a beloved bakery-caf√© chain, elevates dining with a menu focused on fresh ingredients and wholesome options. Delight in a wide array of sandwiches, soups, salads, complemented by freshly brewed coffees and teas, creating a comforting and satisfying dining experience.

deshes.name: Chipotle Chicken Avocado Melt
deshes.short_description: Zesty and creamy: Chipotle Chicken Avocado Melt, a delectable sandwich with grilled chicken, chipotle sauce, and avocado.

deshes.name: Strawberry Poppyseed Salad
deshes.short_description: Fresh and fruity delight: Strawberry Poppyseed Salad, a refreshing mix of greens, strawberries, and poppyseed dressing.

deshes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
deshes.short_description: Crisp and savory: Chicken Caesar Salad, a classic blend of romaine, grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

deshes.name: Chicken Soup
deshes.short_description: Warm and comforting: Chicken Soup, a hearty blend of tender chicken, vegetables, and flavorful broth.

deshes.name: Tomato Basil Bread
deshes.short_description: Aromatic and savory: Tomato Basil Bread, a delightful artisanal loaf infused with rich tomato and basil flavors.

deshes.name: Iced Green Tea
deshes.short_description: Refreshing and revitalizing: Iced Green Tea, a cool and soothing beverage packed with natural antioxidants.

title: Dominos
short_description: Domino's Pizza, a global sensation, serves up delicious and fresh pizzas with a variety of toppings. Enjoy quick delivery, convenience, and the joy of sharing mouthwatering slices with friends and family.

deshes.name: Vegetable Pizza
deshes.short_description: Veggie-loaded delight: Vegetable pizza, a flavorful medley of fresh toppings on a crispy crust.

deshes.name: Margarita
deshes.short_description: Simple and classic: Margherita pizza, a mouthwatering blend of tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil on thin crust.

deshes.name: Pizza Burger
deshes.short_description: A scrumptious fusion: Pizza Burger, where the best of pizzas and burgers unite in delicious harmony.

deshes.name: Bread Sticks
deshes.short_description: Crunchy and savory: Bread sticks, a delightful accompaniment to savor with dips and sauces.

deshes.name: Chiken Pizza
deshes.short_description: Savory poultry perfection: Chicken pizza, a flavorful combination of succulent chicken and delicious toppings.

title: Maxens
short_description: Step into a world of tantalizing flavors at Maxens, an Indian chaat restaurant. Indulge in an explosion of tastes with savory and spicy chaats, crisp samosas, and refreshing beverages, all in a vibrant and inviting ambiance.

deshes.name: Paani Puri
deshes.short_description: Tangy and delightful: Paani Puri, a popular Indian street food, bursting with spicy and savory fillings.

deshes.name: Bhel Puri
deshes.short_description: Crunchy and zesty: Bhel Puri, a delightful Indian snack with puffed rice, chutneys, and veggies.

deshes.name: Dahi Puri
deshes.short_description: Cool and refreshing: Dahi Puri, a mouthwatering Indian snack with yogurt, chutney, and crispy toppings.

deshes.name: Vada Pav
deshes.short_description: Spicy and satisfying: Vada Pav, a beloved Indian street food, with a fried potato patty in a bun.

deshes.name: Pav Bhajji
deshes.short_description: Buttery and flavorful: Pav Bhaji, a popular Indian street food featuring spicy vegetable mash served with soft buns.

deshes.name: Mixed Chaat
deshes.short_description: Chaat medley delight: Mixed Chaat, a delicious assortment of savory, tangy, and crunchy Indian snacks.

short_description: Chipotle Mexican Grill, a taste of fresh, customizable Mexican cuisine. Enjoy flavorful burritos, bowls, tacos, and salads, featuring responsibly sourced ingredients and a variety of mouthwatering salsas and toppings, all prepared with speed and passion.

deshes.name: Chicken Bowl
deshes.short_description: Hearty and flavorful: Chipotle's Chicken Bowl, a delicious blend of grilled chicken, rice, beans, and toppings.

deshes.short_description: Veggie-packed goodness: Chipotle's Veg Burrito, a delectable blend of fresh vegetables, rice, beans, and salsa.

deshes.short_description: Mexican flavors wrapped: Chipotle's Tacos, a delightful fusion of tender meat, toppings, and tortillas.

title: Starbucks
short_description: Starbucks, a global coffeehouse chain, brewing the finest coffees and teas. Indulge in a variety of beverages, pastries, and sandwiches, while enjoying a cozy ambiance or a grab-and-go experience at their numerous locations worldwide.

deshes.name: Tea Latte
deshes.short_description: Creamy and soothing: Tea Latte, a comforting blend of steeped tea and velvety milk.

deshes.name: Caramel Frappuccino
deshes.short_description: Iced caramel delight: Caramel Frappuccino, a sweet and creamy blended coffee beverage topped with caramel drizzle.

deshes.name: Hot Chocolate
deshes.short_description: Warm and indulgent: Hot Chocolate, a velvety cocoa delight, perfect for a cozy treat.

deshes.name: Americano
deshes.short_description: Bold and smooth: Americano, a rich espresso diluted with hot water, delivering pure coffee goodness.

deshes.name: Expresso
deshes.short_description: Intense and concentrated: Espresso, a powerful shot of coffee, the heart of many coffee creations.

deshes.name: Lime Mint Cooler
deshes.short_description: Refreshing citrus twist: Lime Mint Cooler, a thirst-quenching blend of zesty lime and cooling mint.

title: Sushi Roll
short_description: Yo! Sushi is a vibrant Japanese restaurant, offering an exciting fusion of traditional and contemporary flavors. Delight in an array of fresh sushi, sashimi, and delectable dishes, served in a lively, interactive conveyor belt setting, immersing diners in an unforgettable dining experience.

deshes.name: Sushi
deshes.short_description: Delicious bite-sized art: Fresh fish, sticky rice, and vibrant flavors rolled into exquisite sushi creations for an unforgettable experience.

deshes.name: Sashimi
deshes.short_description: Pure elegance on a plate: Finely sliced, premium-grade fish, skillfully presented to savor the delicate flavors of sashimi.

deshes.name: Salmon
deshes.short_description: Luscious and nutritious, salmon is a rich, flavorful fish loved for its versatility and health benefits.

deshes.name: Tofu Curry
deshes.short_description: A harmonious fusion of silky tofu and aromatic spices, creating a delectable and comforting curry dish.

deshes.name: Dumplings
deshes.short_description: Bite-sized bundles of joy: Dumplings, filled with savory goodness, offering a burst of flavor in every bite.

title: Araku
short_description: Experience regal North Indian cuisine at Araku. With a menu fit for royalty, indulge in rich curries, tandoori delicacies, and aromatic biryanis. Immerse yourself in an opulent ambiance and savor the authentic flavors of India.

deshes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
deshes.short_description: Creamy, flavorful Indian delight: Paneer Butter Masala, a vegetarian dish loved for its richness and spices.

deshes.name: Garlic Naan
deshes.short_description: Buttery and aromatic: Garlic Naan, a popular Indian bread infused with garlic flavor, perfect for dipping.

deshes.name: Butter Roti
deshes.short_description: Soft and buttery Indian staple: Butter Roti, a comforting flatbread complementing any dish with delight.

deshes.name: Gobi Fry
deshes.short_description: Crunchy and spiced: Gobi Fry, a delightful Indian appetizer featuring crispy cauliflower florets bursting with flavor.

deshes.name: Dal Thadka
deshes.short_description: Hearty and aromatic: Dal Tadka, a flavorful Indian lentil dish tempered with spices and herbs.

deshes.name: Lassi
deshes.short_description: Refreshing and creamy: Lassi, a traditional Indian yogurt-based drink, a perfect balance of sweet and tangy.

title: Amul restraunt
short_description: Amul, an Indian delight, invites you on a journey through the flavors of the region. Revel in dosas, idlis, and spicy curries, served with warm hospitality in a vibrant setting.

deshes.name: Idli
deshes.short_description: Steamed and spongy: Idli, a popular South Indian dish made from fermented rice and lentil batter.

deshes.name: Onion Dosa
deshes.short_description: Thin, savory, and aromatic: Onion Dosa, a delightful South Indian crepe with a delicious onion twist.

deshes.name: Masala Dosa
deshes.short_description: Crispy and flavorful: Masala Dosa, a beloved South Indian delicacy with a spiced potato filling.

deshes.name: Upma
deshes.short_description: Hearty and comforting: Upma, a flavorful South Indian breakfast dish made from semolina and spices.

deshes.name: Mango Juice
deshes.short_description: Tropical delight in a glass: Mango juice, a luscious and refreshing beverage bursting with natural sweetness.

title: McDonalds
short_description: Quick bites, big flavors: Mcdonads serving a diverse range of tasty burgurs and convenient meals.

deshes.name: McAloo Tikki
deshes.short_description: Indian twist on a classic: McAloo Tikki, a flavorful potato and pea patty burger by McDonald's.

deshes.name: HamBurger
deshes.short_description: All-American classic: McDonald's hamburger, a delicious and iconic fast-food choice loved worldwide.

deshes.name: Fries
deshes.short_description: Golden and crispy: McDonald's fries, the perfect side dish for a savory indulgence.

deshes.name: Coke
deshes.short_description: Refreshing cola bliss: McDonald's Coke, the perfect thirst-quenching companion to your meal.

deshes.name: Chicken Nuggets
deshes.short_description: Crunchy and savory: McDonald's Chicken Nuggets, a bite-sized delight loved by both kids and adults.

deshes.name: McOreo Shake
deshes.short_description: Indulgent dessert bliss: McOreo, a heavenly McDonald's treat featuring Oreo cookies in delightful combinations.
